name: Acidic Drool
description: As an incidental, spend a dark side Destiny Point to give the toothy bite weapon the Burn 2 quality until the end of the chemilizard’s turn; this is a chemical burn.

name: Alliance Leader
description: Alliance operatives add :boost: to all Vigilance and Perception checks when in the NPC’s presence.

name: Ammonia Breather
description: Breathes ammonia, must use a respirator, and if exposed to oxygen, treats it as a dangerous atmosphere with rating 8.

name: Amphibious
description: May breathe underwater without penalty and never suffer movement penalties for traveling through water.

name: Aquatic Creature
description: Suffers no penalties for moving through water and can breathe underwater, but cannot move or survive on land.

name: Awkward
description: Hutts have great physical strength but their bulk imposes severe limitations in flexibility and agility; they add :setback::setback::setback: to all Brawl, Melee, and Coordination checks they’re required to make.

name: Barbed Hide
description: When the rass is hit by a melee attack, the GM can spend :threat::threat: to inflict 1 Wound (ignoring Soak) on the attacker.

name: Brute Strength
description: May add :advantage: to all Brawn-related skill checks.

name: Blessing of the Ancients
description: Once per game session as an incidental, the elder may have a charac­ter within Short range heal 4 wounds.

name: Bite at Their Heels
description: When engaged with a target, allies receive :boost: to combat checks made against the engaged target.

name: Camouflaged
description: When in snowy environ­ ments, add :boost::boost: to ail Stealth checks.

name: Covering Fire
description: May spend a maneuver to add +1 ranged defense to up to three allied characters or minion groups within short range until the end of the next round; this does not stack with multiple uses.

name: Critical Eye
description: Gain :boost: on all rolls made to duplicate a familiar document.

name: Crushing Grip
description: Can maintain a grip on an unfortunate target; as long as it has a victim immobilized in its tentacles, it inflicts 2 strain and 1 wound at the start of the victim’s turn.

name: Crystalline
description: Does not need to breathe and can survive in vacuum and underwater; immune to poisons and toxins

name: Cybernetic Communications
description: Due to their cybernetic modifications, Ganks can communicate silently with other Ganks.

name: Drain Life
description: Whenever a shaoryn inflicts damage on a target after Soak, it heals half that many wounds (rounded up).

name: Droid
description: Does not need to breathe, eat, or drink and can survive in vacuum or underwater; immune to poisons and toxins.

name: Destabilizing Influence
description: As a maneuver once per encounter, may add :threat: to all subsequent Cool and Discipline checks made by enemies within Medium range for the remainder of the encounter.

name: Energy Parasite
description: Mynocks can make an :average: Coordination check to latch onto any starship or vehicle they are engaged with. Ships or vehicles with a mynock attached suffer 1 System Strain per mynock each day and reduce their han­dling by 1.

name: Enhanced Senses
description: Add :advantage: to any Perception checks.

name: Fire Sweep
description: As an action, a droideka can make a :hard: Gunnery check to inflict one hit that deals base damage with its built-in twin heavy blasters on up to two targets within Medium range, plus one additional target per :advantage: on the check; it can only hit each target once this way.

name: Four-armed
description: The gundark gains :boost: on all Brawl checks and may spend :advantage::advantage: on a successful melee attack to hit a second target Engaged with it, dealing the same damage as dealt to the original target.

name: Flyer
description: This creature can fly.

name: Gun Crew
description: For each Imperial Gunnery Corps member in the minion group beyond the first, reduce the Cumbersome rating of their weapons by 1.

name: Hard to Kill
description: The GM may flip one dark side Destiny Point to have the Kintan Strider heal 5 Wounds

name: Helium Allergy
description: When exposed to helium mynocks suffer 1 Wound per round ignoring Soak until their bodies inflate and explode.

name: Hoverer
description: When hovering the character does not have to spend additional maneuvers when navigating difficult terrain.

name: Huttese
description: Hutt security droid neither speaks nor understands Basic.

name: Humming Vibrations
description: As an action, may make an Opposed Charm vs. Discipline check against a target at up to Medium range to disorient the target for a number of rounds equal to :success:; may spend :advantage::advantage::advantage: or :triumph: to stag­ger the target for 1 round instead.

name: Imperial Valour
description: May perform a maneuver to cause all ranged attacks targeting the character to instead hit one ally or helpless enemy in Engaged range, until the beginning of his next turn.

name: Improved Covering Fire
description: When allied minion groups within Short range perform the Covering Fire maneuver, they add +2 ranged defense instead.

name: Loyalty
description: Upgrade the difficulty of social checks targeting the Vodran enforcer once if they conflict with the Vodran enforcer’s loyalty or interfere with his duty to his Hutt masters.

name: Leader
description: All subordinates within Medium range add :boost: to all Discipline checks.

name: Light-Sensitive
description: Defel are vulnerable to bright lights, which cause them intense pain and temporary blindness if v1ewed without protection. A Defel exposed to bright light without protective goggles suffers :setback::setback: on all skill checks.

name: Neurotoxin Doses
description: The Imperial assassin has multiple doses of neurotoxin, which can be introduced into food or drink, or applied to a Melee weapon as a maneuver; if applied to a weapon, it lasts for the remainder of the encounter; if a target ingests poisoned food or drink, or suffers wounds from a poisoned Melee weapon, the target must make an :average: Resilience check; if failed, the target suffers 5 Wounds, plus 1 Strain per :threat:; :despair: means the target must test against the poison again at the start of the next turn.

name: Olfactory Perception
description: Gain :boost: on all Sur­vival checks made to track prey, and adds :setback: to enemy Stealth checks made against the vrblthers.

name: Pheromone Communication
description: Weequay may communicate with other Weequay using pheromones if they are within Short range of each other.

name: Poisonous
description: Any creature that successfully hits the amphibipole with a successful unarmed attack must succeed at a :hard: Resilience check or be poisoned, suffering 3 Wounds at the beginning of the turn for the next three rounds (this ignores Soak).

name: Ponderous
description: Hutts can never spend more than one maneuver moving per turn.

name: Photonic Burst
description: Once per encoun­ter as an action, photon spider can unleash a pulse of light from its body; all targets within Short range are disoriented for two turns.

name: Pirate Leader
description: May perform a maneuver to give orders to other pirate allies in Medium range, granting them :boost: on their next check.

name: Reckless Strike
description: As an incidental, once per round, the GM may have the Kintan Strider reroll a Brawl or Melee check; if he does so, the Kintan Strider loses the benefits of the Adversary and Durable talents until the beginning of its next turn.

name: Self-destruct Mechanism
description: Should the probe droid’s mission become compromised, it may self-destruct as an out of turn incidental; this expliosion does 10 damage to engaged characters.

name: Shadowed
description: When in darkness or deep shadow, add :boost::boost: to all Stealth checks.

name: Shield Projector
description: Maneuver to activate or deactivate; while active, gains defense 2 and upgrades the difficulty of all combat attacks targeting the droideka once, but droideka cannot use the Move maneuver.

name: Spaceport Leader
description: Spaceport staff add :boost: to all Vigilance and Perception checks when in the Spaceport Administrator’s presence.

name: Stinky
description: While within Short range of a Huttlet, non-Hutt char­acters reduce their Strain thresholds by 2.

name: Suited to the Cold
description: Wampas are immune to the effects of freezing and cold environments.

name: Sweep Attack
description: The rancor can spend :triumph: on a successful Brawl check to hit the target as well as anyone engaged with the target.

name: Swipe
description: Spend :advantage: during melee combat to cause an engaged opponent to suffer 1 Strain.

name: Tactical Direction
description: May perform a maneuver to direct one Imperial Army minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free maneuver or add :boost: to its next check.

name: Trained Mount
description: Add :boost: per rank to a rider’s Survival checks while mounted.

name: Overwhelming Fire
description: May perform a maneuver to direct one Imperial Army minion group within Medium range; the group may perform an immediate free combat check action.

name: Vacuum Dweller
description: Can survive in vacuum without penalty and can move in a vacuum envi­ronment.

name: Wookiee Rage
description: Deal +1 damage with Brawl and Melee attacks when suffering any Wounds. When suffering a Critical Injury, deal +2 damage with Brawl and Melee at­tacks instead.

name: Mountain Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Sur­vival and the Natural Outdoorsman talent (once per game session, a Mountain Nikto may reroll any one Resilience or Survival check).

name: Pale Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Athlet­ics. A Pale Nikto never suffers movement penalties for traveling through water and can hold his breath for a number of rounds equal to twice his Brawn rating before beginning to drown.

name: Green Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Coordination and a Green Nikto may add :boost: to checks to climb. Additionally, add claws as an unarmed attack.

name: Red Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Resilience. When making skill checks, a Red Nikto may remove :setback: imposed due to arid or hot environmental conditions.

name: Southern Nikto
description: Add 1 rank in Perception. A Southern Nikto may add :boost: to Perception and Vigilance checks to detect sound.
